page.title: 04Shopping Facilities
page.content: In Long Lawford there are seven shops,a Co-operative store, an Off Licence,a Tool Hire shop, Flower shop,Post Office and another Food shop. The Co-op sells fresh food as well as pre-packed produce. It is the only supermarket in the village.The other food shop is called Ernie's and this has an Off Licence selling drinks, tobacco and snacks attached to it. A fish and chip shop also supplies "Take away" food and drink. The Flower shop provides bouquets of flowers for weddings as well as supplying flowers for the houses of the village. The Tool Hire shop has a wide range of tools and equipment available for use. Over the years the shopping scene has changed considerably.
